attachments.title: Relative Pronouns
attachments.text: A relative pronoun is a type of pronoun used to connect a relative clause (also known as an adjective clause) to the main clause in a sentence.

attachments.fallback: Thornhill English Tutor: The Real Reason Schools Don't Teach Grammar Anymore
attachments.title: The Real Reason Schools Don't Teach Grammar Anymore
attachments.text: Are we facing the grammar apocalypse? It seems somewhere, down the line, schools virtually stopped teaching grammar to our kids. So folks, if you've ever wondered why schools don't teach grammar anymore, read closely.

text:
